function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on food trucks as a research context","Impact":"Limited applicability to other service contexts","Mitigation":"Include diverse service contexts in the research","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, practitioners","Owner":"Researchers"},{"Description":"Reliance on data from food truck practices","Impact":"Limited generalizability to other businesses","Mitigation":"Validate findings with a broad range of business types","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, practitioners","Owner":"Researchers"},{"Description":"Emphasis on resilience during environmental uncertainty","Impact":"Potential neglect of disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Include a public health perspective in resilience strategies","Technologies":"Contactless service technology, sanitation systems","People":"Businesses, customers, non-business communities","Owner":"Public health authorities, businesses"}]}
